did.unittitle: Milwaukee, Wisconsin City-County Public Employees Strike News Clipping File, 1973
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Newspaper clippings on the strike of city and county public employees in Milwaukee, Wisconsin from January 4 to 11, 1973.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of newspaper clippings on the strike of city and county public employees in Milwaukee, Wisconsin from January 4 to 11, 1973.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Milwaukee, Wisconsin City-County Public Employees Strike News Clipping File #5212. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
